data.text: @FoxForceFlacco CPAC is the GOP. To pretend otherwise is folly. And I say that with zero delight.
@FoxForceFlacco @blurstofmikes @DieInTheGulch Let’s really tighten the screws on Putin and impose a curfew on St. Petersburg.

@FoxForceFlacco @blurstofmikes @DieInTheGulch So pleased he symbolically severed the symbolic sister state relationship with St. Petersburg, site of the largest anti-war & anti-Putin rallies. 

Also love that Ferguson called for symbolic legislation to symbolically sever the symbolic relationship.
@blurstofmikes @DieInTheGulch "But I'm going to tell someone to find out! Unless it's complicated. In which case I'll go on national TV to talk about it, without actually doing anything."
@DieInTheGulch @FoxForceFlacco when he announced he was divesting russian interests from state investments he actually said "i dont know if we actually have any"
@FoxForceFlacco @mattgonter That would infer he ever did things related to his job
@FoxForceFlacco So far it seems like it’s all symbolic stuff and no actual support. Governor Photo Op.
